name: Cthulhu: Death May Die â€“ Forbidden Reaches
description:
Forbidden Reaches is the new, upcoming Season of Cthulhu: Death May Die. Whether you're a veteran investigator or a newcomer ready to confront the occult, this campaign is the perfect gateway into the madness—or a thrilling next chapter to push your skills to new heights with new Elder Ones, fresh Episodes, and novel gameplay mechanics, something fierce can already be heard roaring in the distance…

Death May Die is back, pushing fear to new limits by introducing a new game mode and the giant King of Monsters to its renown gameplay.
